body: A spellcaster can apply multiple metamagic feats to a single spell. Changes to its level are cumulative. You can't apply the same metamagic feat more than once to a single spell.
url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Feats/Types of Feats/Metamagic Feats/Multiple Metamagic Feats on a Spell
name: Multiple Metamagic Feats on a Spell
